parameters.jsCode:
// Sample patient medical records
const patients = [
  {
    patientId: "PAT-001",
    fullName: "Robert Johnson",
    ssn: "123-45-6789",
    dateOfBirth: "1975-03-15",
    address: "123 Oak Street, Boston, MA 02101",
    phone: "(617) 555-0123",
    email: "robert.johnson@email.com",
    insuranceNumber: "BC123456789",
    medicalRecordNumber: "MRN-789456123",
    diagnosis: "Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus",
    medications: [
      "Metformin 500mg twice daily",
      "Lisinopril 10mg once daily"
    ],
    labResults: {
      glucose: "145 mg/dL",
      hba1c: "7.2%",
      cholesterol: "220 mg/dL"
    },
    visitDate: "2024-01-15",
    provider: "Dr. Sarah Williams",
    department: "Endocrinology"
  },
  {
    patientId: "PAT-002",
    fullName: "Maria Garcia",
    ssn: "987-65-4321",
    dateOfBirth: "1982-08-22",
    address: "456 Pine Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90210",
    phone: "(323) 555-0456",
    email: "maria.garcia@email.com",
    insuranceNumber: "AET987654321",
    medicalRecordNumber: "MRN-456789123",
    diagnosis: "Hypertension",
    medications: [
      "Amlodipine 5mg once daily",
      "Hydrochlorothiazide 25mg once daily"
    ],
    labResults: {
      systolicBP: "140 mmHg",
      diastolicBP: "90 mmHg",
      creatinine: "1.1 mg/dL"
    },
    visitDate: "2024-01-16",
    provider: "Dr. Michael Chen",
    department: "Cardiology"
  },
  {
    patientId: "PAT-003",
    fullName: "David Smith",
    ssn: "456-78-9012",
    dateOfBirth: "1968-12-10",
    address: "789 Elm Street, Chicago, IL 60601",
    phone: "(312) 555-0789",
    email: "david.smith@email.com",
    insuranceNumber: "UHC456789123",
    medicalRecordNumber: "MRN-123789456",
    diagnosis: "Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)",
    medications: [
      "Albuterol inhaler as needed",
      "Tiotropium 18mcg once daily"
    ],
    labResults: {
      fev1: "65% predicted",
      fvc: "70% predicted",
      oxygenSaturation: "94%"
    },
    visitDate: "2024-01-17",
    provider: "Dr. Jennifer Lee",
    department: "Pulmonology"
  }
];

// Return each patient as a separate item for processing
return patients.map(patient => ({
  json: patient
}));

parameters.content:
## üè• HIPAA PII Processing

**This workflow uses default settings:**
- **`preserveStructure: false`** (default)
- **`includeMetadata: false`** (default)

### What this means:
- **Simple output** - Original data is overwritten with censored data
- **Clean results** - No extra properties, just censored data
- **Easy to use** - Straightforward data structure

### Data Structure:
```json
{
  "fullName": "‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà",     // Censored data
  "ssn": "‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà-‚ñà‚ñà-‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà",          // Censored data
  "email": "‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà@‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà.‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà"       // Censored data
}
```

**Perfect for:** Medical research, HIPAA compliance, healthcare data anonymization

**Want full audit trails?** Try the Advanced version with both features enabled!
